thread.title: Evgeni Malkin goes full Hanson brother in Johnstown
thread.title_full: Evgeni Malkin goes full Hanson brother in Johnstown

author: sgentille@sportingnews.com (Sean Gentille)
title: Evgeni Malkin goes full Hanson brother in Johnstown
text:
Evgeni Malkin goes full Hanson brother in Johnstown Sporting News 2 days ago sgentille@sportingnews.com (Sean Gentille) The Penguins and Lightning are playing a preseason game in Johnstown, Pa., on Tuesday night. The NHL's official story is that Johnstown won the "Hockeyville" contest and, thus, the right to host the game.
AdChoices We know better, though; it's all a thinly veiled excuse for "Slap Shot" references. The minor league hockey classic was filmed in the town 500 years ago, or whatever.
MORE: The best sports movies of all time
NBC Sports' pregame coverage laid it on thick, but it was all welcome enough. Keep Evgeni Malkin away from the vending machines at ol' War Memorial.
This just made my night! #hockeyvilleusa #pens pic.twitter.com/NnFA44ZbHh
— Brian Metzer (@Brian_Metzer) September 29, 2015
Malkin will no longer be playing a game of skill, only of face punching pic.twitter.com/wK0uiW4VY3
— Stephanie (@myregularface) September 29, 2015
Hey Doc! #HockeyvilleUSA pic.twitter.com/qwruO1NKa3
— NHL on NBC (@NHLonNBCSports) September 29, 2015
